info.title: APIMetrics Calls API
info.description: The API for managing APIMetrics API calls.

parameters.name: Body
parameters.description: {     meta: {         name: Minimal API test name     },     request: {         method: get,         url: http://httpbin.org/get     } }

parameters.name: auth_id
parameters.description: The ID of the authentication setting

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID string of API Call

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID string of API Call

parameters.name: kind
parameters.description: Granularity of data required, one of DAY, WEEK, MONTH, tYEAR

parameters.name: location_id
parameters.description: Location where the API Call was made.

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: ISO formatted date string for the period you wish to view.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Return stats for all calls in the time period specified which had this result.

post.summary: Trigger an API Call to run
post.description: Trigger an API Call to run

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: {     location_id: ,     context: {         foo: 1234,         bar: %%RESULT_ID%%,         datum: %%DATETIME%%     } }

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Dictionary of variable names and their values

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID string of API Call

parameters.name: location_id
parameters.description: Location ID of test agent that will make the request

get.summary: List Stats from before a date for an API Call
get.description: List Stats from before a date for an API Call

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID string of API Call

parameters.name: kind
parameters.description: Granularity of data required, one of DAY, WEEK, MONTH, YEAR.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

parameters.name: location_id
parameters.description: Location where the API Call was made.

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: ISO formatted date string for the end of the period you wish to view.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Return stats for all calls in the time period specified which had this result.

get.summary: List Stats since a date for an API Call
get.description: List Stats since a date for an API Call

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID string of API Call

parameters.name: kind
parameters.description: Granularity of data required, one of DAY, WEEK, MONTH, YEAR.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

parameters.name: location_id
parameters.description: Location where the API Call was made.

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: ISO formatted date string for the start of the period you wish to view.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Return stats for all calls in the time period specified which had this result.
